result.name: BepInEx for KSP 2
result.short_description: Modloader for Unity games
result.author: bbepis

result.name: LagRemover [SPACEWARP 0.2]
result.short_description: A mod aimed at improving performance. Unfortunately KSP2 seems to have some heavy underlying issues so this only brings minor improvements at major Visual and Gameplay costs.
result.author: RadioArtz

versions.changelog:
Updated Space Warp Version. you will NEED to update for this to function.
[Update it here](https://spacedock.info/mod/3257/Space%20Warp#info)

-more things get disabled / removed now: mainly water though (THIS NO LONGER HAS PHYSICS COLLISION!!)
-fixed lots of objects not getting disabled as intended
-clouds are now fully gone and no longer spam the logs with errors
-automatically overrides JOINT_RIGIDITY in physics settings, hopefully improving craft stability and performance

result.name: Space Warp
result.short_description: A C# Modding API for KSP2
result.author: cheese3660

versions.changelog:
1. Moved to being a KSP abstraction layer over BepInEx
2. Added game state abstractions for mods to use
3. Cleaned up the console UI
4. Added feature that allows mods to add their own main menu buttons
5. Added OAB app.bar support
6. Cleaned up app.bar stuff somewhat
7. Added BepInEx.ConfigurationManager as a dependency and added a button in the mods UI to open it
8. Added colors to the debug console, with fancy options to change them
9. Packaged all dependencies with the release, including the licenses
10. Packaged a default configuration for BepInEx that fixes an issue with the manager object not persisting
11. Likely a few more things I forgot
Fixed issue with new installation

Change Log
- Added Roslyn Error Output
- Added Addressables Loading System For Custom Parts
- Added Localization Loading System For Custom Parts
- Added Fancy UI Elements, which can be grabbed by SpaceWarpManager.Skin
- Added AppBar Integration With A ToolBarWindow Class and a one liner for window registration
- General Refactoring
- A *Lot* of Bug Fixes
Roslyn support

Changelog
   - Added AssetBundle loading system (Documentation coming soon)
   - Switched to HarmonyX
   - Code Refactoring
Mod Breaking
   - Mods that used the configuration system may break, but stuff like custom-flags-mod and lazyorbit have been tested w/o recompilation
Added License file

Changes

- Mods folder has been moved to [KSP_ROOT]/SpaceWarp/Mods
- Game no longer requires DLL patching, instead uses a preloader via doorstop
- A console window has been added (alt-c)
- Configuration sections have been added (ConfigurationSectionAttribute)

Installation

- Drag the contents of space-warp-release-0.1.0.zip into the KSP root directory
- Launch the game

- Added configuration and mod UI (alt-m)
- Fixed a few bugs
- Did not fix bug with custom install locations

result.name: Lazy Orbit
result.short_description: Set a vessel's orbit, rendezvous and land using a simple menu opened with ALT+H.
result.author: Halban

versions.changelog:
- Added a button in the app bar.
- Changed the UI to match the style of KSP 2.
- Fixed a bug that would cause to Lazy Orbit to stop working after going back to the main menu.
- Built for Space Warp 0.3.0.

- Added 'Advanced', 'Landing', and 'Rendezvous' modes. Advanced mode contributed by XYZ3211.
- Built against Space Warp 0.2.0.
- Updated for Space Warp 0.0.2

result.name: Custom Flags
result.short_description: Adds the ability to add custom flags

versions.changelog: Added a public API for mods to load custom flags. Either call one of the overloads for LoadCustomFlag or simply create an addressable with the sprites tagged 'custom_flag'

result.name: Small Debug Window

versions.changelog:
### New features

- Dump VAB parts list into a CSV file
  - Dump the full parts list from the VAB into a CSV in the game's folder
- Enable Texture Streaming
  - Toggle texture streaming on and off
- Enable Post Processing
  - Enable or disable post processing rendering
- Enable Clouds
  - Enable or disable volumetric clouds rendering

### How to upgrade
Extract the .zip contents into the Kerbal Space Program 2 directory, overwriting existing files.

## New
- Add VFX test suite window

## How to upgrade
Extract the .zip contents into the Kerbal Space Program 2 directory, overwriting existing files.
Fix old class names

result.name: Space Warp + BepInEx
result.short_description: A C# modding api on top of BepInEx for KSP2
result.author: cheese3660

versions.changelog: A few minor fixes over the last release

# V1.0.0

## Changelog
1. Updated documentation site to reflect latest version
2. Added localization loading from addressables
3. Some UI changes
4. Added some more UI functions
5. Added automatic version checking, for spacewarp, and non spacewarp mods that have a `swinfo.json` file with `version_check` filled in
6. Changed the mod UI to show both space warp and non space warp mods
7. Added extensions for vehicle controls
8. Added extension to get parts with a module
9. A lot more minor improvements and fixes

## Known Bugs
Spacewarp will call mods that support 0.1.0 to 0.2.0 unsupported for the moment, will be fixed in a patch soon

## Notes
This is version 1.0.0 as it reflects a stable base that the API will have added onto going forwards
Instead changed to package space warp + bepinex for ease of installation for new users
Fixed new installation issue

Change Log
- Added Roslyn Error Output
- Added Addressables Loading System For Custom Parts
- Added Localization Loading System For Custom Parts
- Added Fancy UI Elements, which can be grabbed by SpaceWarpManager.Skin
- Added AppBar Integration With A ToolBarWindow Class and a one liner for window registration
- General Refactoring
- A *Lot* of Bug Fixes

result.name: Micro Engineer
result.short_description: Displays useful in-flight information about your vessel, your orbital trajectory and your maneuvers.
result.author: Micrologist

versions.changelog:
* Add rearranging, inserting & removing entries to/from any window
* Add renaming of windows
* Add creation & deletion of new custom windows
* Add locking of windows (popped out windows cannot be closed or dragged)
* Add separator entry

- conversion to Space Warp 0.4.0 (Thanks `@AdmiralRadish`)
- add layout save/load feature (Thanks `@Falki`)
- add latitude / longitude readout (surface)

- tweak stage section layout to accommodate large TWR / burn time values
- add orbital: time to soi transition
- add surface: biome
- bunch of unit / precision tweaks

- reworked ui/layout
- add: stage info (dv, twr, burn time)
- add: flight drag & lift stats (might be expensive)
- add: surface alt msl/agl distinction

This will be the last release before the SpaceWarp BepinEx conversion.

- add: tgt ap / pe
- ui: slimmed out
- fix: tgt & man popout windows showing empty squares

- feat: popout windows
- add: (atmospheric) flight section

- reduced line spacing
- fix: terrain alt
- add: maneuver projected ap/pe
- changed close button

- add orbital period information
- add target information
fixed missing folder leading to stuck configuration window

versions.changelog:
Part selection in OAB now selects the correct part.
Fixed tons of UI bugs.
fixed gui bugs
Fixed lag caused by Devmode being left on

Fixed a ton of bugs. Like some toggles displaying the wrong thing.

Added support for more parts

Added ingame part manager back in.

Sliders n stuff Part 2

All part types are now implemented. 
if something is missing DM me on discord or create an issue on the repo and I will get it added.

This update adds in sliders for most parts 

Resources have also been added

Works in OAB

Next version will remove the Part manager button
